name: Explorer's Crypt [ALPHA 0.1]
description:
Current Version: Alpha 1

Explorer's Crypt is a pixel art, RPG, roguelike dungeon crawler that is inspired by classic gameboy games and Zelda. Each floor of the crypt is randomly generated for a unique experience each time you play.

Upcoming Features
  • Boss battle at end of each floor
  • More loot and items
  • Better inventory screen
  • Original music that isn't borrowed
  • Lighting system
Keyboard Controls

Arrow Keys — Move/Navigate Menus
Spacebar — Open inventory
Z & X— Use equipment
Esc — Pause
M — Toggle mute

How To Play

You must collect weapons, loot and artifacts to aid your exploration of the crypt. Search rooms for loot, battle enemies, and search for the boss key to again access to the boss of that floor. You must clear a room of all enemies to continue exploring the crypt.
